name: acclimatization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of changing to suit different conditions of life, weather, etc., or the act of making someone or something do this: Overseas drivers driving on the opposite side of the road for the first time may need a few days of acclimatisation. Inadequate acclimatization may lead to altitude sickness above 8,000 ft. Related word
acclimatize
More examplesFewer examplesThis excursion requires previous acclimatization to the altitude.The acclimatization period was one week.The advice and support they got from the lottery organizer contributed to their successful acclimatisation to sudden wealth.
